document_data.name: Brightleaf
document_data.sex: Male{{Cite adventurers league/Herald of the Moon|8-9}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Brightleaf''' was a [[treant]] in [[Cormanthor]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite adventurers league/Herald of the Moon|14-15}}
document_data.Activities: Brightleaf regularly reported forest news to [[Serinia]] of [[Elventree]].
document_data.History: He succumbed to the madness of the [[demon lord]] [[Graz'zt]] until some adventurers (members of the [[Emerald Enclave]] hired by [[Elanil Elassidil]] to bring peace to the spirit of her ancestor [[Meira Faerenduil]]) confronted him.
document_data.Personality: In his madness, Brightleaf considered himself a god. He was wary of strangers but not hostile at first. He spoke metaphorically and painfully slowly in a rich bass tone, but almost never reached a point.
document_data.Relationship: Brightleaf was an ally of the Emerald Enclave and had dealings with Serinia.
